main.name: Matthew Ouyang
main.bio: I have always been interested in technology and it's importance in the world. It started in high school Mechatronics class where we built and programmed robots using micro controllers. It was then I discovered my passion for coding and engineering. I enjoy problem solving and automating the world around you through software programming. I am excited for the future prospect of software in AI, Cloud Computing, Autonomous vehicles and space travel. These are some of the many feilds I'm hungry to pursue. Throughout my career I want to make a positive and lasting impact on people for many generations to come.
main.contactmessage: I look forward discussing an exciting opportunity with you.  Please feel free to contact me.

education.description: Achieved a cumulative GPA of 8.6 / 9 to date and included on the Dean’s Honours List 2020. University tour guide and new student mentor (Feb-Mar 2021). Active member of the University’s Muay Thai club and Kiwi Asian social club.

work.title: Web Developer
work.description: Develop and maintain the Auckland student pool association's event and registration app.

work.title: Crew Member
work.description: Received the Employee of the Month Award in January and February 2019 for consistently exceeded monthly KPIs and maintaining customer satisfaction ratings. Due to outstanding performance and demonstrating strong leadership/hospitality skills, given further responsibility for managing the kitchen in an unsupervised capacity.Developed and taught crew members new efficient methods of preparing food, which in turn led to exceeding monthly KPI targets.

projects.title: Event Registration & Payment
projects.category: Auckland Student Pool Association event registration and payment app.

projects.title: Virtual Team Pet
projects.category: DEVS Hackathon 1st place app. Virtual team pet to promote good coding practices.

projects.title: Small business lead generation
projects.category: MYOB IT challenge small business lead generation web app prototype. Top 3 NZ.

projects.title: Android messaging app
projects.category: Add friends, send messages and photos.

projects.title: Social note sharing
projects.category: Take notes and share with others. Like comment and recieve notfications.

projects.title: Traffic Jam terminal game
projects.category: Simulate the game of traffic jam within the terminal, university project.

testimonials.text: Here you should write some nice things that someone has said about you. No lies though, employers can tell when you are lying.

That Tim Baker must be one of the most brilliant developers I've ever met! It is amazing that nobody has hired him yet. Hey you, you should hire this guy, he may be fresh out of University and have zero on the job experience but I am confident that he will be one of your best developers in no time!
